text:
[ RECENT NEWS :  Quick Gameplay thoughts 3/23  /  Ask Riot  /  Demacia lore updates  /  MSI 2017 -  Tickets ,  Schedule  /  How to revive a Dragon ]

Two sales are going on this weekend, the March Early Sales and March Bundles . While the bundles last through March 30th, the early sales will only last through March 27th, so make sure you catch them before they are gone! Continue reading for more info on what's on sale! 
Table of Contents March Bundles (available through 3/30) March Early Sales (available through 3/27) Baker Pantheon Star Guardian Janna Star Guardian Lulu 
It’s time for March bundles!  A set of limited time March Bundles  are in the shop though  March 30th at 23:59 PT. 
"Grab these limited-time bundles now through  3/30/17 at 23:59 PT. Femme Fatale Bundle - 50% off  at 2396 RP (4553 RP if you need the champions)

Skins included: 
Arcade Ahri Ravenborn LeBlanc (Legacy) Wildfire Zyra Death Blossom Elise French Maid Nidalee Champions included: 
Ahri LeBlanc Zyra Elise Nidalee 
Space Created Bundle - 50% off  at 2475 RP (4365 RP if you need the champions)

Skins included: 
Pool Party Fiora Forsaken Jayce Iron Inquisitor Kayle Constable Trundle Order of the Lotus Irelia Champions included: 
Fiora Jayce Kayle Trundle Irelia 
Overly Attached Mid-Laners Bundle - 50% off  at 2699 RP (4903 RP if you need the champions)

Skins included: 
PROJECT: Ekko Infernal Diana Sashimi Akali Shockblade Zed Bilgewater Katarina Champions included: 
Ekko Diana Akali Zed Katarina 
Armored Farmers Bundle - 50% off  at 2475 RP (4679 RP if you need the champions)

Skins included: 
Mecha Kha’Zix Eternum Rek’Sai Gragas Caskbreaker Marauder Olaf Beast Hunter Sejuani Champions included: 
Kha’Zix Rek’Sai Gragas Olaf Sejuani" 
March Early Sales: 3/24 - 3/27 March's Early Sales  are also live through March 27th , including discounts on Baker Pantheon , Star Guardian Janna , and Star Guardian Lulu !
"The March  Early Sale  is officially here! To kick things off, the following non-Legacy skins from the past 4-6 months are going on sale from  March 24, 2017 00:00 PT through March 27, 2017 23:59 PT!  As an additional heads up, the Dunkmaster Darius chromas that were in last month’s announcement article will have their Early RP Sale as part of the larger Chroma IP Sale happening this March." 
Baker Pantheon 
Star Guardian Janna 
Star Guardian Lulu 
Reminders Speaking of sales, we have a few other promotions currently going - 
Chroma for IP sale live through April 5th ! 10 sets of chroma are on sale for 2000 IP each. 

With his champion update live in 7.7 , a Galio bundle and the legac y Hextech Galio are available in the shop through March 28th!
